Deadly Judgment.name: Deadly Judgment
Deadly Judgment.flavor: The pain your enemy suffers from your attack is also felt by its allies.
Deadly Judgment.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage. Each enemy within 2 squares of the target takes necrotic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Shadow Slip.name: Shadow Slip
Shadow Slip.flavor: Speaking a sinister word whispered only in the blackest parts of the Underdark, you disappear from the sight of those you have cursed.
Shadow Slip.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you are invisible to each creature cursed by you.

Cursing Vengeance.name: Cursing Vengeance
Cursing Vengeance.flavor: You call up the spirit of a slain drow priest, and her words resound in your foeâ€™s ears, condemning the creature to a withering death.
Cursing Vengeance.onHit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage. Until the end of the encounter, the first time the target makes an attack roll against you, it takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends).
Cursing Vengeance.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, the first time the target makes an attack roll against you, it takes ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends).
